ygData.subject: OOC
ygData.msgSnippet: Today I am announcing that I am leaving the Neo Beast Wars RPG. This not for mass moding or my little endeavour with JP3884, nothing like that. I am leaving

Received: from Inferno731@... by imo-r07.mx.aol.com (mail_out_v28.15.) id a.6c.2fabd2c (3872) for <nbwrpg@egroups.com>; Wed, 13 Sep 2000 20:55:53 -0400 (EDT)
Message-ID: <6c.2fabd2c.26f17c19@...>
Date: Wed, 13 Sep 2000 20:55:53 EDT
Subject: OOC
To: nbwrpg@egroups.com
MIME-Version: 1.0
Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit
X-Mailer: AOL 4.0 for Windows 95 sub 106
From: Inferno731@...

Today I am announcing that I am leaving the Neo Beast Wars RPG. This not for 
mass moding or my little endeavour with JP3884, nothing like that. I am 
leaving because I have simply lost interest and ran out of ideas. I could 
keep up if I wanted to time was not an issue. After I am gone to can do 
whatever with my characters and the Pred Base. Good Bye everyone I had a 
great time rping with all of you. I just simply lost interest and motivation.

PS: If you want to say Good bye to me don't do it over egroups because by the 
time most of you get this message I will have already unsubscibed.

Good bye everyone. I hope you can keep this RPG going forever :)!
